Having trouble scanning? • Make sure the MRZ is within the frame. The MRZ is on the bottom of Passports and Visas, and on the back of cards such as the Enhanced Driver\'s License or a U.S Permanent Resident Card. • Make sure the document is centered within the bounds of the box • Reduce glare on your document by angling the document or blocking the offending light source • In dim lighting, enable the flashlight using the icon in the top right of the scanner screen • Move your document slowly in and out • Try landscape mode • Make sure your hand doesn\'t cover text on the document
